SELECT count(1) FROM t_tsa_total_order po
po.platformPromotion = #{platformPromotion}

SELECT po.id,po.orderType,mi.userName,po.totalPrice,po.platformDeduction, po.integralPrice,po.payPrice,po.payState,po.payType as platformPayType, po.cardPrice,po.payTime FROM t_tsa_platform_order po LEFT JOIN t_mem_member mi on mi.id=po.memberId WHERE po.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tsa_store_order SET orderState = #{orderState} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,orderType,totalPrice,platformDeduction, integralPrice,payPrice,payState,payType FROM t_tsa_platform_order WHERE deletedFlag = 0 AND id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM t_tsa_total_order as ttto where deletedFlag = 0
AND ttto.id in (select ttso.totalOrderNo from t_tsa_store_order as ttso where ttso.deletedFlag = 0 and ttso.orderType = #{orderStroeType})
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
AND ttto.createdTime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{beforDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND ttto.createdTime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{afterDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

select tttoresult.priceRange as rangeStr,count(*) as count FROM (select CASE WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 0 AND ttto.payPrice <= 50 THEN '0-50' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 51 AND ttto.payPrice <= 100 THEN '51-100' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 101 AND ttto.payPrice <= 200 THEN '101-200' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 201 AND ttto.payPrice <= 500 THEN '201-500' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 501 AND ttto.payPrice <= 1000 THEN '501-1000' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 1001 AND ttto.payPrice <= 5000 THEN '1001-5000' WHEN ttto.payPrice >= 5001 AND ttto.payPrice <= 10000 THEN '5001-10000' ELSE '10001' END as priceRange from t_tsa_total_order as ttto WHERE ttto.deletedFlag = 0
AND ttto.id in (select ttso.totalOrderNo from t_tsa_store_order as ttso where ttso.deletedFlag = 0 and ttso.orderType = #{orderStroeType})
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
AND ttto.createdTime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{beforDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND ttto.createdTime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{afterDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
) as tttoresult GROUP BY tttoresult.priceRange ORDER BY tttoresult.priceRange

AND date(ttto.createdTime) >= date(#{beforDate,jdbcType=DATE})
AND date(ttto.createdTime) <= date(#{afterDate,jdbcType=DATE})
